title: Never doing that again. EVER
body:
Oh I thought it would be a good idea. The whole idea of name changing did not sink well with me. I feel like this name sticks with me. it is who I am :^) I shall remain as Musterpulse until the end of the days :3
____
PS After my name got changed my separate friend groups also got changed so yeah... oopsie

replies.body:
Oh man I should tell you the reason of my name change, but I won't tell you the name about my past HEHEHEHE. After I matured in university and transferred my account from NA to OCE, I realised that my name was childish and unsophisticated in the league community so I decided to change it. 

And here I am :>>>>

Every time a make a mistake this,  is what i get.

> OMG THIS [Champion] SO JUST TRASH

And i'm just sitting there not knowing how to respond to it.
